topic.title: Getting bucket configuration
topic.shortdesc: To retrieve information about an existing bucket, use the GET operation with the /pools/default/buckets/bucketName URI.

body.p: The main REST API bucket endpoint is ends with the bucket name.
Clients MUST use the nodes list from the bucket, not the pool to indicate which are the appropriate nodes to connect to.

link.desc: The bucket management and configuration REST API endpoints provide a fine level of control over the individual buckets in the cluster, their configuration, and specific operations.
